systemDescription: A retrieval-augmented AI system that integrates both knowledge bases and databases to support natural language queries for Q&A, data analysis, and chart visualization.

mock.salesTrend7Days.answer: Based on sales data analysis from the past 7 days, sales show a fluctuating upward trend.
mock.salesTrend7Days.suggestion1: Wednesday's sales performance was outstanding; suggest analyzing success factors.
mock.salesTrend7Days.suggestion2: Weekend sales are stable; consider launching weekend promotions.
mock.salesTrend7Days.suggestion3: Overall trend is good; suggest maintaining current marketing strategy.
mock.thisMonthSales.answer: This month's cumulative sales are {{totalSales}}, a {{growth}} increase from last month.
mock.thisMonthSales.suggestion1: Excellent sales performance; suggest continuing current strategy.
mock.thisMonthSales.suggestion2: Focus on inventory management to avoid stockouts.
mock.lowStock50.answer: Found 3 products with stock below 50 units, needing timely replenishment.
mock.lowStock50.suggestion1: 4K Monitor needs urgent restocking; suggest placing an order immediately.
mock.lowStock50.suggestion2: Wireless Mouse and USB-C Cable stock is low; suggest restocking soon.
mock.lowStock50.suggestion3: Set up automatic replenishment reminders to avoid stockouts.
mock.topSelling.answer: According to sales data, Laptop Pro 15" performed best.
mock.topSelling.suggestion1: Laptop Pro 15" is a star product; suggest increasing stock.
mock.topSelling.suggestion2: Accessory sales are stable; consider offering bundles.
mock.topSelling.suggestion3: Monitor products have potential; suggest increasing promotion.
mock.default.answer: Regarding your question "{{query}}", I have analyzed the relevant data for you.
mock.default.suggestion1: You can try more specific questions, like 'What were sales this month?'
mock.default.suggestion2: You can ask about inventory, sales trends, etc.
mock.default.suggestion3: The system supports natural language queries; feel free to ask anything.

salesTrend7Days.answer: The sales trend for the past 7 days shows an upward movement with a 12.5% increase compared to the previous week.
salesTrend7Days.suggestion1: Analyze sales by product category for the past 7 days.
salesTrend7Days.suggestion2: Compare this week's performance with the same week last month.
salesTrend7Days.suggestion3: Check inventory levels for top-selling products this week.

thisMonthSales.answer: This month's total sales are {{totalSales}}, marking a {{growth}} increase from last month.
thisMonthSales.suggestion1: View detailed sales report for this month.
thisMonthSales.suggestion2: Identify products with the highest sales growth this month.

lowStock50.answer: There are 3 products currently low in stock (below 50 units), with 1 item completely out of stock.
lowStock50.suggestion1: Generate purchase orders for low stock items.
lowStock50.suggestion2: Review sales velocity for out-of-stock items.
lowStock50.suggestion3: Set up low stock alerts for critical products.

topSelling.answer: The top-selling products this period are Laptop Pro 15", Mechanical Keyboard, and Wireless Mouse.
topSelling.suggestion2: Run a promotion on accessories for Laptop Pro.
topSelling.suggestion3: Analyze profit margins for top products.

default.answer: I have processed your query: "{{query}}". Here is the relevant information.
default.dataMessage: This is mock data because the API is not connected or the query type is not yet fully implemented for direct API calls.

hybridDataSourceDescription: Hybrid data source supports multiple file types: CSV/Excel files will be processed via SQL, TXT/PDF/Word files will be processed via RAG
hybridDataSourceHelp: Suitable for scenarios requiring both structured data (tables) and unstructured data (documents) processing

about.title: About Project
about.resumeDownloadError: Resume download failed, please try again later

description.title: Function Introduction
description.content: This project aims to provide an intelligent data analysis platform that leverages advanced AI technologies to help users better understand and utilize their data.

features.title: Main Features
features.multiModel: Multi-model integration with cloud platform OpenAI and OpenRouter API access, private Ollama integration.
features.mcpIntegration: MCP integration implements chart-based MCP services.
features.websocket: WebSocket enables real-time tracking and visualization of process execution status.
features.multiDataSource: Multi-data source isolation, allowing custom multiple data sources with mutually isolated data logic.

techStack.title: Main Technology Stack
techStack.content: React, LangChain, LangGraph, FastAPI, LLM, Embedding Model, Chart MCP.

hitl.title: Human-in-the-Loop (HITL)
hitl.description: Enable pause/interrupt controls during workflow execution
hitl.pauseDescription: Temporarily pause execution for quick resume
hitl.interruptDescription: Interrupt execution and save to history

introduction.title: Personal Introduction
introduction.content: I have over 10 years of software development experience, covering projects in frontend, backend, big data, machine learning, and other domains. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at the University of Auckland, and expect to graduate in November 2025. During my postgraduate studies, I have been primarily focused on full-stack development for AI Agent applications, and I am actively seeking a related position in this field.
